long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Todoist One-Click enables you to quickly create tasks in Todoist directly from your browser. It captures the active tab's title and URL with just a single click or a keyboard shortcut.

Within the extension settings, you can configure default project and labels and also define custom rules for specific URLs to automatically apply tailored labels and projects.

To get started, obtain your API token from 'Todoist Settings > Integrations > Developer'.
